resume_data.summary: Het Patel is an aspiring AI Engineer with a strong background in Python, SQL, and various machine learning libraries like TensorFlow and Scikit-learn. They have experience in designing multi-agent workflows, deploying applications with Docker, and solving real-world problems with data-driven solutions. Their professional experience includes roles in technical support, machine learning, and data science, where they developed churn prediction models, optimized training workflows, and designed data cleaning pipelines. Key projects include a medical analysis agent using Google Gemini, a content-based recommendation engine, and a face recognition attendance system.
key_points: Aspiring AI Engineer with interest in Generative AI and Predictive Analytics.

Skilled in Python, SQL, Machine Learning, Multi-Agent Systems, LLMs, NLP, Computer Vision, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, Docker, Git, CI/CD, Flask, Streamlit, FastAPI, Data Preprocessing, Feature Engineering, Pandas, NumPy, Tableau.
Provided technical support for AI and Machine Learning development.
Developed Customer Churn Prediction models using TensorFlow, achieving a 15% reduction in false positives.
Refactored training workflows with vectorised NumPy operations, resulting in a 20% acceleration in model training speed.
Designed automated data cleaning and normalisation pipelines for raw client data.
Conducted statistical analysis on user behaviour datasets to identify key churn indicators.
Built a medical analysis agent (Healthcare Helper) using Google Gemini and Flask, achieving 95% extraction accuracy on OCR.
Engineered a content-based recommendation engine (Spotify Preference Modelling) using K-Means clustering and PCA.
Developed a real-time attendance automation system (Face Recognition Attendance System) using Python and OpenCV.
Holds a B.E. in Information Technology from Gujarat Technological University with a CGPA of 8.23.
resume_data.raw_text_preview:
HET PATEL 
 
Ahmedabad, India | +91 9725647609 | phet4311@gmail.com | LinkedIn | GitHub 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
Aspiring AI Engineer with an interest in Generative AI and Predictive Analytics. Skilled in 
Python, SQL, and various machine learning libraries, including  TensorFlow and Scikit-learn. 
Experienced in designing multi-agent workflows and deploying basic applications with Docker 
and interested in solving real-world problems with data-driven solutions. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Python, SQL, Machine Learning, Multi -Agent Systems, LLMs, NLP , Computer Vision, 
TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, Docker, Git, CI/CD, Flask, Streamlit, FastAPI, Data Preprocessing, 
Feature Engineering, Pandas, NumPy, Tableau 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Recruit Riders Technologies | Technical Expert Mahesana | Dec 2025 – Present 
• Provided technical support for AI and Machine Learning development using Python. 
• Assisted in code optimisation and debugging to ensure smooth software performance. 
Space-O Technology | Machine Learning Intern Ahmedabad | Aug 2024 – Feb 2025 
• Developed Customer Churn Prediction models using TensorFlow, achieving a 15% 
reduction in false positives through hyperparameter optimisation (Grid Search). 
• Refactored training workflows with vectorised NumPy operations, resulting in a 20% 
acceleration in model training speed for large-scale datasets. 
FusionBit | Data Science Intern Ahmedabad | Jan 2024 – Apr 2024 
• Designed automated data cleaning and normalisation pipelines for raw client data to 
ensure high-quality input features. 
• Conducted statistical analysis on user behaviour datasets to identify key churn 
indicators, directly influencing feature selection for production models. 
PROJECTS 
Healthcare Helper (Medical Analysis Agent): Built a medical analysis agent using Google  
Gemini and Flask to extract clinical data from prescription images and achieved 95% 
extraction accuracy on OCR.  
Spotify Preference Modelling : Analysed 85,000+ tracks to engineer a content -based 
recommendation engine using K-Means clustering and PCA for dimensionality reduction. 
Face Recognition Attendance System : Developed a real -time attendance automation 
system using Python and OpenCV to streamline user identification processes. 
EDUCATION 
B.E. Information Technology | Gujarat Technological University | CGPA: 8.23  
Graduated: 2024

Overview 
The Dynamics 365 Business Central team within Microsoft is dedicated to revolutionizing 
business operations with a suite of comprehensive agentic business solutions. As we 
navigate this era of digital and AI transformation, we focus on delivering agentic and 
seamless experiences, empowering organizations with cutting-edge solutions.   As 
Software Engineer within the Dynamics 365 Business Central team, you are actively 
involved in developing and maintaining highly scalable world class business solutions that 
incorporate the latest generative AI innovation.    Microsoft’s mission is to empower every 
person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come 
together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our 
shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to 
create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond. 
 
Responsibilities 
 
• Design, code, test and deploy robust, scalable, and high-performance AI/Model-first 
features for our business solutions using C#, .NET, Azure and modern AI 
technologies 
• Collaborate closely with product managers, UX researchers, AI researchers and 
other engineers to translate complex business requirements into well-architected 
solutions 
• Actively participate in the team’s agile processes, contributing to planning and 
design sessions and sprint retrospectives. 
• Enhance system quality by conducting code reviews, developing test automation 
Evals to ensure features are accurate, reliable and maintainable. 
• Contribute to the health of our live services by monitoring performance and online 
evals metrics, investigating and resolving production issues, and participating in an 
on-call rotation. 
 
 
Qualifications 
 
Required qualifications: - 
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or 
equivalent industry experience. 
• Professional experience in full-stack software development, with a proven track 
record of shipping commercial software. 
• 1+years hands on experience building production ready applications a modern 
programming language such as C#, TypeScript, Python or similar. 
• Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively in an agile team 
environment. 
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to clearly 
articulate complex technical topics and discuss requirements with stakeholders. 
• High level understanding of AI Language Models, prompt engineering, and Agentic 
workflows. 
• Familiarity with CI/CD, automated testing, and modern DevOps practices. Preferred 
Qualifications: 
• Experience building and deploying scalable applications using modern AI 
technologies 
• Proficient with relational databases, SQL and data modeling 
• Previous experience working with complex, data-intensive business applications 
Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening 
requirements are required for this role. 
• These requirements include but are not limited to the following specialized security 
screenings: Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to 
pass the Microsoft Cloud Background Check upon hire/transfer and every two years 
thereafter.
